title: Aw nang vanrama kal duh mi chuan
lyrics:
Aw nang, vanrama kal duh mi chuan, 
Lal Isua lam en fo rawh; 
Khawngaihin a lo hruai zel ang che, 
Lal Isua lam enfo rawh.

Lal Isua lam en fo rawh; 
Chhun leh zan a hruai zel ang che, 
Lal Isua lam en fo rawh.

Sual tura thlem i tawh hun pawhin, 
Lal Isua lam en fo rawh; 
Pathian thu chu rilrua vawngin, 
Lal Isua lam en fo rawh.

Dam lai kawng chu hrehawm hle mah se, 
Lal Isua lam en fo rawh 'I hnenah ka awm,' a tih kha le, 
Lal Isua lam en fo rawh.

I dam lohva i thih dawn hunin, 
Lal Isua lam en fo rawh; 
Vanram chu i han thlen thleng pawhin, 
Lal Isua lam en fo rawh.
